item.title: JOINT ANALYSIS OF SNP AND GENE EXPRESSION DATA IN GENETIC ASSOCIATION STUDIES OF COMPLEX DISEASES
item.description: Meta data of reading Journal: The Annals of Applied Statistics Year: 2014 DOI: 10.1214/13-AOAS690 Motivation The goal is to assess the genetic effect of the specific gene on the disease. In this paper, the authors casted the genetic effect as two parts: Effect through gene expression of the given gene Other genetic effect (i.e.Â splicing, but some gene-unrelated mechanisms are also possible as long as it is determined genetically, say enhancer activity) The paper used genotype data along with paired gene expression data.
